sen.j: 日吉町（ひよしちょう）は、2005年12月31日まで京都府船井郡に存在した町である。
sen.e: Hiyoshi-cho was a town in Funai-gun, Kyoto Prefecture, which was present until December 31, 2005.
Hiyoshi-cho was a town in Funai-gun, Kyoto Prefecture, which existed until December 31, 2005.
Hiyoshi-cho was a town in Funai-gun, Kyoto Prefecture, which existed until December 31, 2005.

sen.j: 2006年1月1日に周辺4町が合併して南丹市となり、地方公共団体としての日吉町は歴史の幕を閉じた。
sen.e: On January 1, 2006 four neighboring towns were merged to form Nantan City, thereby ending up the history of Hiyosho-cho as a local government.
On January 1, 2006 four neighboring towns were merged to form Nantan City, thereby ending the history of Hiyosho-cho as a local government.
On January 1, 2006 four neighboring towns were merged to form Nantan City, thereby ending the history of Hiyoshi-cho as a local government.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 現在は南丹市の行政区の地名として残されている。
sen.e: At present, Hiyoshi-cho remains as an administrative district in Nantan City.
At present, Hiyoshi-cho remains an administrative district in Nantan City.
At present, Hiyoshi-cho remains an administrative district in Nantan City.

sen.j: 京都府中部に位置する。
sen.e: Hiyoshi-cho is located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Hiyoshi-cho is located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Hiyoshi-cho is located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.cmt: Mountains を追加しました。Mt. と表記しました。

sen.e: Rivers: Kozumi-gawa River and Tahara-gawa River

sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 山陰本線：日吉駅 (京都府) - 鍼灸大学前駅 - 胡麻駅
sen.e: Sanin Main Line: Hiyoshi Station (Kyoto Prefecture) - Shinkyudaigakumae Station - Goma Station
